meanings.sent1: I need to decouple the old printer from the computer.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic will decouple the engine from the car for repair.
meanings.sent3: Trying to decouple the stuck zipper was like solving a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: She felt like decoupling herself from the stressful situation.
meanings.sent5: The magician performed a trick by decoupling the linked rings.

meanings.definition: The act of separating or disengaging
meanings.sent1: The decoupling of the train cars was smooth and efficient.
meanings.sent2: Decoupling of the power source caused the machine to stop working.
meanings.sent3: The decoupling of the two best friends was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: The decoupling of the music and the video created a unique effect.
meanings.sent5: The decoupling of the dancer from the music made the performance unforgettable.
